vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-npc.name: Default NPC frame (hostile NPC's)
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-npc.hint: A frame image stored on the Foundry server and that is used as a default frame.
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-neutral.hin: A frame image stored on the Foundry server and that is used as a default frame.
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-pc.name: Default Character frame
vtta-tokenizer.default-frame-pc.hint: A frame image stored on the Foundry server and that is used as a default frame.
vtta-tokenizer.image-upload-directory.hi: The avatar and token upload location on the server, relative to the Foundry/Data directory.
vtta-tokenizer.npc-image-upload-director: NPC image upload directory for NPC tokens
The avatar and token upload location on the server, relative to the Foundry/Data directory.
vtta-tokenizer.frame-directory.name: Directory for custom token frames
vtta-tokenizer.frame-directory.hint: The frame location on the server to store images.
vtta-tokenizer.add-frame-default.name: Add a frame to the token when opened
vtta-tokenizer.add-frame-default.hint: If not selected, Tokenizer will not add the default frame to the token when it's opened.
vtta-tokenizer.image-save-type.name: Image File Type
vtta-tokenizer.image-save-type.hint: The avatar and token images will be saved in this format. webp is preferred as it produces smaller file sizes on average.
vtta-tokenizer.token-size.name: Token size
vtta-tokenizer.token-size.hint: Specifies the token size (width and height). A value higher than 200 is recommended.
vtta-tokenizer.portrait-size.name: Portrait size
vtta-tokenizer.portrait-size.hint: Specifies the portrait size (width and height). A value higher than 200 is recommended.
vtta-tokenizer.requires-upload-permissio: Tokenizer requires the permission to Upload Files. Please inform your Gamemaster.
vtta-tokenizer.title-link.name: Title bar link?
vtta-tokenizer.title-link.hint: Place the tokenizer link in the title bar?
vtta-tokenizer.default-color.name: Default background colour for token?
vtta-tokenizer.default-color-layer.name: Add a color layer by default?
vtta-tokenizer.log-level.name: Log level
vtta-tokenizer.disable-avatar-click.name: Disable avatar click (global default)
vtta-tokenizer.disable-avatar-click.hint: Don't open Tokenizer when avatar picture is clicked. (Shift click will still open Tokenizer).
vtta-tokenizer.disable-avatar-click-user: Don't open Tokenizer when avatar picture is clicked. (Shift click will still open Tokenizer).
vtta-tokenizer.token-only-toggle.name: Token only default
vtta-tokenizer.token-only-toggle.hint: If selected defaults to true, can be toggled in tokenizer, per player setting
vtta-tokenizer.disable-omfg-frames.name: Disable OMFG frames
vtta-tokenizer.disable-jcolson-frames.na: Disable JColson Token Frames module integration
vtta-tokenizer.reset-custom-frames.name: Reset Custom Frames?
vtta-tokenizer.default-token-offset.name: Default Token Offset
vtta-tokenizer.default-token-offset.hint: When auto applying a frame, how many pixels to offset image by. Will be auto scaled to match.
vtta-tokenizer.default-algorithm.name: Use Ray Algorithm for mask detection?
vtta-tokenizer.default-crop-image.name: Crop Images?
vtta-tokenizer.default-crop-image.hint: Images are automatically cropped to fit the shortest side and centred. This is useful in some auto-tokenize situations, but is probably not needed day-to-day.
